name: ribbon lace scarf
notes:
how to crochet a ribbon lace scarf! this stunning scarf looks complicated but is in fact, a very simple and easy 3 row repeat! 

made entirely in one piece, it shows off your variegated yarns beautifully. if you are looking for something a little bit different to crochet that has the “wow” factor, then this is the scarf for you!

 yarn & hook information: suitable for any yarn - use the recommended hook size for your chosen yarn 

for my scarf i used 1 x ball of sirdar jewelspun with wool in the colourway “precious reef” with a 6mm hook 

my scarf is approximately 10ft long with 47 motifs in total (including first and last motif)
